# Overview
This document provides a very brief discussion of immunology in two simpler animal models, drosophila and zebrafish.



# Videos & Slides

In this recording from 2021, Paul provides a very brief discussion of immunology in drosophila and zebrafish. The slides for this session [can be found here.](./slides/2021_Immunology_in_simpler_animals.pdf)
